comment:
* Interface definition of a callback to be invoked when there
     * has been an error during an asynchronous operation (other errors
     * will throw exceptions at method call time).

methods.name: void onError(@NonNull MediaSync sync, int what, int extra)
methods.comment:
* Called to indicate an error. * * @param sync The MediaSync the error pertains to * @param what The type of error that has occurred: *
    *
  • {@link #MEDIASYNC_ERROR_AUDIOTRACK_FAIL} *
  • {@link #MEDIASYNC_ERROR_SURFACE_FAIL} *
* @param extra an extra code, specific to the error. Typically * implementation dependent.

methodNames: void onError(@NonNull MediaSync sync, int what, int extra)
